name: Velvo Luxe 3-Seater Sofa
description: The Velvo Luxe 3-Seater Sofa is the epitome of comfort and style. Crafted with plush cushions and a modern design, this sofa is perfect for any living room. Its luxurious fabric and neutral tones make it a versatile addition to your home decor.

name: MapleNest Wooden Coffee Table
description: The MapleNest Wooden Coffee Table brings warmth and rustic charm to your living room. Made from high-quality wood, its sturdy structure and elegant finish make it a standout piece. Ideal for placing drinks, books, or decorative items.

name: GlowAura LED Floor Lamp
description: Illuminate your space with the GlowAura LED Floor Lamp. This sleek, modern lamp features energy-efficient LED lighting, providing both style and function. Its adjustable head allows for focused light, perfect for reading or creating a cozy ambiance.

name: UrbanChic Framed Mirror
description: The UrbanChic Framed Mirror is the perfect accent piece for your hallway or bedroom. Its sleek frame and elegant design reflect contemporary style while adding a touch of sophistication to any room.
